Esta propuesta ha sido elaborada teniend: This proposal has been prepared taking into account the EN1090-2 manufacturing standard for the EXC2 execution class.
No está contemplado en la misma, sistema: It is not contemplated in it, fire protection systems (active or passive) of metallic structures.
Debido a la instabilidad que se verifica: Due to the instability that is verified in the prices of steel products, this proposal will be valid for 10 days, at the end of this period we reserve the right to totally or partially revoke the products offered.
En ausencia del estudio geotécnico para: In the absence of the geotechnical study for the work, a soil stress equal to 200KPa is assumed, the foundations will be of the superficial type connected with footing beams.
El hormigón concebido para estos trabajo: The concrete designed for these works will be of the C25/30 S2 type.
Los medios y equipos necesarios serán ut: The necessary means and equipment will be used according to the typology of the land.
En las zapatas serán aplicados y nivelad: The anchor bolts that will fix the columns will be applied and leveled on the footings.
El ensamblaje de todas las partes que co: The assembly of all the parts that make up the structures will be by means of semi-automatic welding with ER 70S-6 wire of D 1.2-1.6mm under protective gases, B(Gas Metal arc weldingB( (GMAW).
Estarán compuestas por perfiles laminado: They will be made up of hot-rolled profiles with a full web, steel class S275JR.
Tratamiento superficial: decapado abrasi: Surface treatment: abrasive pickling to Sa 2 B= grade according to ISO8501-1: 2007.
Tratamiento anticorrosivo: pintado con a: Anticorrosive treatment: painted with the application of a two-component zinc-rich epoxy primer, application of a two-component epoxy intermediate and a universal RAL 7038 finish.
Tratamiento anticorrosivo: galvanizado p: Anticorrosive treatment: hot-dip galvanized according to the current standard ISO 1461.
Todos los elementos estructurales que co: All the structural elements that make up the building will be joined with high-strength screws in accordance with DIN 933 ZINC class 8.8.
Correas de fachadas y cubierta, elemento: Facade and roof straps, secondary fixing elements all in cold-formed galvanized profiles of class S 320GD steel.
Todos los elementos estructurales serán: All structural elements will be fixed by high-resistance screws in accordance with DIN 933 ZINC, class 8.8.
Canales simples conformados en frio de a: Simple cold-formed channels of class S 320GD steel and PVC pipes 0.4 MPa, D 140mm for rainwater discharge.
Canales simples con aislamiento conforma: Caleiras isoladas, enformadas a frio de aço classe S 320GD, e tubos de PVC 0,4 MPa, D 140mm para descarga de águas pluviais.

Revestimiento en tejas simples en fachad: Cladding in simple tiles on the facade, universal RAL color subject to the availability of each manufacturer.
Se incluyen todos los remates de fachada: All facade and roof finishes in lacquered sheet metal in the same color as the metal closure are included.
Los tornillos de fijación, serán del tip: The fixing screws will be of the type DIN7504-K & DIN7504P(O)-H.
Portón seccionado de (:A x :B)m de estru: Sectional gate of (:A x :B)m with tubular structure covered in sandwich panel, including sliding guides, support and fixing accessories, all in galvanized steel, tempered treated steel springs, optional manual or automatic operation with electric operator, lock drive and command by fixed keypad.
Puertas de emergencia simple de una hoja: Simple emergency doors with a sheet of (:A x :B )m, tubular structure and simple sheets covered and painted on both sides, including fixing accessories and anti-panic bar.
